column1: # Bugfix: A section is smaller than a level

column2: An entire section of the tower has been reserved for smithing. Smiths are craftsmen who use metal and mold them into items like swords, shields, armour or the special crown that goes on your head.
A complete level of the tower has been given to the tower smiths. Smiths are craftsmen who use metal and mold them into items like swords, shields, armour or the special crown that goes on your head.
